alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 14 at 3:55PM CST until December 14 at 8:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN HARRISON AND NORTHEASTERN HANCOCK COUNTIES... At 354 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kiln, or 7 miles west of Diamondhead, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Diamondhead, Lyman and Kiln. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 15 and 34. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for southern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
